title: If history repeats itself, the bear market has 6 months of pain ahead, Bank of America’s chief strategist says - Yahoo Finance
content: If history repeats itself, the bear market has 6 months of pain ahead, Bank of America’s chief strategist says  Yahoo Finance
description: Bank of America’s Michael Hartnett looked at the past 19 bear markets to project when the current one will end—and where the S&P 500 will be when it does.
